nodes.text: The TS-series interrogation droid was produced by Arakyd Industries for the Imperial Intelligence agency. The model was marketed as a medical droid, but was actually used for interrogation. The TS-series interrogation droid was a droid equipped with medical tools as hands. The droid would use these hands to torture its victims while interrogating them. The model was equipped with a Chem Injector Hypo, medical scanners, stimpacks,  and high-intensity spotlights.
